sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
OFFICE_DP = #officeDp#
OFFICE_CD = #searchOffice#
$searchOfficeCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
OFFICE_DP = #officeDp#
OFFICE_CD = #searchOffice#
$searchOfficeCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC
LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO RFC_COMTCOFFICE ( OFFICE_CD, SGROUP_ID, OFFICE_NM, OFFICE_DP, OFFICE_SORT_IX, OFFICE_PARENT_CD, OFFICE_IMG, OFFICE_MEMO, OFFICE_TEL, OFFICE_FAX, OFFICE_IS_USE, OFFICE_IS_BOARD, OFFICE_REAL_CODE, OFFICE_TMP, ) VALUES ( #officeCd#, #sgroupId#, #officeNm#, #officeDp#, #officeSortIx#, #officeParentCd#, #officeImg#, #officeMemo#, #officeTel#, #officeFax#, #officeIsUse#, #officeIsBoard#, #officeRealCode#, #officeTmp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE SET OFFICE_NM=#officeNm#, OFFICE_SORT_IX =#officeSortIx#, OFFICE_MEMO=#officeMemo#, OFFICE_TEL=#officeTel#, OFFICE_FAX=#officeFax#, OFFICE_IS_USE=$officeIsUse$, OFFICE_IS_BOARD=$officeIsBoard$, OFFICE_TMP=#officeTmp# WHERE OFFICE_CD=#officeCd#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
OFFICE_PARENT_CD = #officeCd#

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE OFFICE_DP = #officeDp# AND OFFICE_CD LIKE '$officeCd$%' ORDER BY OFFICE_CD DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
SGROUP_ID=#sgroupId#
OFFICE_PARENT_CD = #officeCd#
OFFICE_PARENT_CD LIKE '$officeParentCd$%'
OFFICE_DP = #officeDp#
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
OFFICE_CD LIKE '$officeCd$%'
OFFICE_DP = #officeDp#
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE OFFICE_PARENT_CD LIKE '$officeCd$%'
OFFICE_IS_USE = '1'
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
WHERE SGROUP_ID=#sgroupId# AND OFFICE_DP = #officeDp#
OFFICE_IS_USE = '1'
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, nvl((select max(OFFICE_SORT_IX) from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_PARENT_CD=A.OFFICE_CD),0) officeMaxSortIdx, (select max(OFFICE_CD) from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_PARENT_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) officeMaxOfficeCd, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE OFFICE_CD = #officeCd#

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE OFFICE_IS_USE='1' AND SGROUP_ID=#sgroupId# order by OFFICE_CD ASC
select OFFICE_CD officeCd from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_PARENT_CD =#officeCd#

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE OFFICE_IS_USE='1'
SGROUP_ID=#sgroupId#
OFFICE_CD LIKE concat (#officeCd# , '%')
ORDER BY OFFICE_CD, OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
SGROUP_ID=#sgroupId#
OFFICE_PARENT_CD = #officeCd#
OFFICE_PARENT_CD LIKE '$officeParentCd$%'
OFFICE_DP = #officeDp#
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
OFFICE_CD = #officeCd#
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
OFFICE_DP = #officeDp#
OFFICE_CD = #searchOffice#
$searchOfficeCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
SGROUP_ID=#sgroupId#
OFFICE_PARENT_CD = #officeCd#
OFFICE_PARENT_CD LIKE '$officeParentCd$%'
OFFICE_DP = #officeDp#
OFFICE_IS_USE = #officeIsUse#
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE
WHERE SGROUP_ID=#sgroupId# AND OFFICE_DP = #officeDp#
OFFICE_IS_USE = '1'
OFFICE_CD = #officeCd#
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_CD officeCd, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, OFFICE_DP officeDp, OFFICE_SORT_IX officeSortIx, OFFICE_PARENT_CD officeParentCd, OFFICE_IMG officeImg, OFFICE_MEMO officeMemo, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_IS_USE officeIsUse, OFFICE_IS_BOARD officeIsBoard, OFFICE_REAL_CODE officeRealCode, OFFICE_TMP officeTmp FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD LIKE '$officeCd$%'
ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE SET OFFICE_NM=#officeNm#, OFFICE_REAL_CODE=#officeRealCode# WHERE OFFICE_CD=#officeCd#
UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE SET OFFICE_IS_USE=#officeIsUse# WHERE OFFICE_CD=#officeCd#
